Class DocumentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • DocumentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentManagerInterface

    public class DocumentManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocumentManagerInterface
    The data manager for a program that manages the order of documents based on their priority Manages instances of the Reader and Document classes using a Stack and 3 ArrayDeques as data structures
    Author:
    Adam Holt
